Name: Witness of the Night
About the game: Witness of the Night is a new horror adventure in which you will have to survive the night in the old observatory, plunge into the creepy memories of the main hero and uncover the mystery of signals from space. Danger in the DARK SURREAL ATMOSPHERE STORY You play as Eddie, a man who has had a passion for cosmos since an early age. One day his friend asks him to help her find a mysterious signal from outer space. As Eddie searches for the signal mystical events begin to unfold in the observatory as well as beyond. FEATURES - Use the observatory computer and print out images of mysterious radiation from space. - Various atmospheric locations. - Horror built around a sense of the mystery. - A short experience that can be completed in an hour.
